#summary Plugin: Assign random keyword

Plugin for YOURLS 1.5+: Assign randoms keyword to shorturls, like bitly (sho.rt/hJudjK)

= Install =

  * In `/user/plugins`, create a new folder named `random-keyword`
  * Create a blank file named `plugin.php`
  * Cut and paste the following code
  * Go to the Plugins administration page and activate the plugin

= Code =

{{{
<?php
/*
Plugin Name: Random Keywords
Plugin URI: http://yourls.org/
Description: Assign randoms keyword to shorturls, like bitly (sho.rt/hJudjK)
Version: 1.0
Author: Ozh
Author URI: http://ozh.org/
*/

global $ozh_random_keyword;

/*
 * CONFIG: EDIT THIS
 */

/* Length of random keyword */
$ozh_random_keyword['length'] = 5;

/* Allowed characters in random keyword */
$ozh_random_keyword['chars']  = '1234567890ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz';

/*
 * DO NOT EDIT FARTHER
 */

yourls_add_filter( 'random_keyword', 'ozh_random_keyword' );

function ozh_random_keyword( $args ) {
	global $ozh_random_keyword;
	return yourls_rnd_string( $ozh_random_keyword['length'], 0, $ozh_random_keyword['chars'] );
}
}}}
